data.title: EA SPORTS FC™ 24 Clubs
data.meta_description: Level up your Virtual Pro by playing matches in Clubs or Volta Football™, earning Skill Points and PlayStyles to make them stand out.
data.text:
Level up your Pro by playing Drop-in and Rush matches, earning Skill Points to improve your attributes and PlayStyles to make them stand out on the pitch. When you're ready, join/create a club to take on the Clubs League with your friends. Each Season presents a new opportunity to move through the divisions and earn big rewards in the pinnacle of Clubs League football -- the Playoffs. Can you climb from the bottom of the Clubs League pyramid to reach the heights of Elite Division?

Easily review your club achievements and stats such as Skill Rating, overall record, and your total goals, or track your current season progress on your Clubs Overview page. Show off your club to friends and rivals online by copying and sharing the URL. Scout other clubs and players from the Top Clubs section, or search for clubs directly; you can see the team composition and other critical information of any club in EA SPORTS FC™ 25. You can also review your recent match history and see a breakdown of the performance for all players that took the pitch. Get your club started now in EA SPORTS FC™ 25.
